none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on September 23, 2019 Description from Terminal Escape:
You've been warned - this one is really good. Jerky, quirky, aggressive New York shits that bring to mind mid '00s acts like SYNTHETIC ID as they morph late '80s outsider punk and art house drenched Alternative Tentacles fare into . Guitar/s are all over the damn place with single note leads and awkward atonal spurts, while the bass delivers effortless Dean Clean caliber runs that exhaust the neck and drive the entire mix. Only four songs here, though I admit that I have rarely been this spent from simply listening to a demo.  ii don't fuck with me
https://spitehouse1.bandcamp.com/

seo.title: Spite House - ii  - Terminal Escape
